## Description {#details}

Macro.

Uses the SubclassData32 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slot.

Definition at line 3856 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
